header.role: Software Developer Intern at Safety IO

tabs.name: UX/UI Design
notableOutcomes: Applied an end-to-end UX process using Miro and Figma for user research, ideation, wireframes, and prototypes.

tabs.name: Agile Processes

tabs.name: Cloud Development
